page.title: 02EMPLOYMENT IN AIRDRIE
page.content: THE LOCAL JOB CENTRE IN GRAHAM STREET INFORMS US THAT JOB DEPENDANCY IN AIRDRIE AT THE MOMENT IS CENTRED MAINLY ON INDUSTRIES RELATED TO METAL ELECTRONICS AND PHARMACEUTICALS. THERE ARE FEW AGRICULTURAL WORKERS AS MOST OF THE FARMLAND HAS BECOME ERODED. THERE SHOULD BE POSSIBLE GROWTH IN THE FUTURE IN INDUSTRIES RELATED TO THHE MANUFACTURE OF BOTH MECHANICAL AND ELECTRICAL/ELECTRONIC COMPONENTS. THE OLD INDUSTRIES OF THE AREA SUCH AS IRON AND AND STEEL AND WHISKEY DISTILLING, HAVE BEEN BADLY HIT HERE AS ELSEWHERE ALONG WITH THOSE DEPENDENT APON THEM LIKE MALTINGS AND DISTRIBUTION CENTRES. THE DECLINE IN THE BRITISH STEEL CORPORATION HAS CAUSED A"KNOCK ON SYNDROM" WHICH HHAS AFFECTED LOCAL "NUTS AND BOLTS" PRODUCERS.
